version_description:
- Fixed a bug where multiple songs were played at the same time
- Minor menu fixes
- Balancing adjustments
- Localisation fixes

Update 1.3

-truck physics updates
-some minor bugfixes and improvements
-optimization work (performance)

Update 1.4

2D GRAPHICS

3D GRAPHICS

•Updated chrome shader on trucks

GAMEPLAY

PROGRAMMING

•Some AI improvements

•7 new cities
•New missions

•Major and minor bugfixes for level design issues

• NEW MAP UPDATE: Western Territory
